parameter.name: tasklist_id
parameter.description: ID of the task list in which the task to be created is stored

parameter.name: deleted
parameter.description: Flag indicating if the task is deleted.

parameter.name: due
parameter.description: Due date of the new task.

parameter.name: hidden
parameter.description: Flag indicating if the task is hidden.

parameter.name: parent
parameter.description: Parent task identifier. If the task is created at the top level, this parameter is omitted.

parameter.name: previous
parameter.description: Previous sibling task identifier. If the task is created at the first position among its siblings, this parameter is omitted.
